Most recent news about stablecoins appearing first.

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import pandas as pd
import os
from IPython.display import display, Markdown

archive_path = 'data/news_archive.csv'

if os.path.exists(archive_path):
    df = pd.read_csv(archive_path)
    # Ensure datetime
    df['published_dt'] = pd.to_datetime(df['published_dt'])
    
    # Sort just in case
    df = df.sort_values(by='published_dt', ascending=False)
    
    # Generate Markdown table or list
    for _, row in df.iterrows():
        display(Markdown(f"### [{row['title']}]({row['link']})"))
        display(Markdown(f"_{row['published']}_"))
        display(Markdown("---"))
else:
    display(Markdown("No news archived yet."))
```
